Research

At a glance

  • Largest Diabetes & Endocrine Treatment Center in the Southeast United States
  • Advanced facilities and equipment including DEXA scan, EKG, and Ultrasound
  • Leading experts in Endocrine Treatment, Dr. Bruce W. Bode MD, FACE, Dr. David G. Robertson MD, and N. Spencer Welch, MD.
  • Offering services in Internet Medicine and MDVIP
30 Exam Rooms
65 Staff
